page.title: 02LEISURE IN N.TONBRIDGE:TV
page.content: For the project on Leisure Activities 2 housing estates representative of the area were used for interviews.24% were interviewed in their houses,while the rest were interviewed on the streets.The most popular leisure activity was TV,which 92% watched regularly.Of this 92%,34%(GROUP A) were aged below 20,12%(GROUP B) were aged between 20 and 40,24%(GROUP C) were between 40 and 60 and the rest (GROUP D) were over 60. Group B watched the most TV but this was the smallest group.Group D however watched the least TV.The most popular type of programme was drama,then comedy.18% had no preference. The most popular channels were ITV and BBC1,while the least popular channel was Channel 4.
